title: Declare dependency properties in XAML
body: Declaring new dependency properties on my user controls and the like requires so much boilerplate, even with code snippets. (And why not update the snippet to use the nameof operator for the declaring class name if you're using C# 6, anyway? Would make refactoring so much easier!) Anyway, if I could declare dependency properties in XAML, I think that would be much more intuitive.
